mapper.select: select count(*) from MATERIAL_BOARD where status = 'Y'
select board_no , class_no , board_title , board_writer , to_char(create_date,'RRRR/MM/DD') as create_date , status from MATERIAL_BOARD where status = 'Y' order by board_no desc

select count(*) from MATERIAL_BOARD where status = 'Y'
and BOARD_WRITER like '%'||#{ keyword }||'%'
and BOARD_TITLE like '%'||#{ keyword }||'%'
and BOARD_CONTENT like '%'||#{ keyword }||'%'

select board_no , class_no , board_title , board_writer , board_content , to_char(create_date,'RRRR/MM/DD') as create_date , status from MATERIAL_BOARD where status = 'Y'
and board_writer like '%'|| #{ keyword } ||'%'
and board_title like '%'|| #{ keyword } ||'%'
and BOARD_NO like '%'|| #{ keyword } ||'%'
order by board_no desc

select board_no , class_no , class_name as "CLASS_NAME" , board_title , board_writer , board_content , origin_name , change_name , count , to_char(create_date,'RRRR/MM/DD') as create_date , status from MATERIAL_BOARD join class using(class_no) where status = 'Y' and board_no = #{ boardNo }
mapper.update: update material_board set count = count+1 where board_no = #{ boardNo }
mapper.insert: insert into material_board ( board_no , class_no , board_title , board_writer , board_content , origin_name , change_name , count , create_date , status ) values ( SEQ_MBNO.nextval , #{ classNo } , #{ boardTitle } , #{ boardWriter } , #{ boardContent } , #{ originName } , #{ changeName } , 0 , sysdate , 'Y' )
